text: Steve Bridges (May 22, 1963 – March 3, 2012) was an American comedian, impressionist, and actor. He was known for his impressions of politicians, television characters and broadcasters including Bill Clinton, George W. Bush, Barack Obama, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Don Knotts, Homer Simpson, Tom Brokaw, Paul Harvey, and Rush Limbaugh."Biography" . SteveBridges.com Retrieved May 23, 2015. On March 3, 2012, Bridges was found dead by his maid in his Los Angeles home, aged 48. His death was ruled an accident, with the probable cause "upper airway anaphylaxis” from a severe allergic reaction. ==References== ==Other websites== * Comedy Central Bio * Steve Bridges Profile Page - Video clip, speaking topics * "George W. Bush impersonator Steve Bridges dies at 48" Category:1963 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from anaphylaxis Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Dallas Category:Comedians from Dallas
title: Steve Bridges
